name: 气舍 (Qì Shè)
function_Chinese: 气舍为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治咳嗽、气喘、咽喉肿痛，通调气机，利咽平喘。
function_English: Qì Shè is a point on the Gallbladder Meridian, used to treat cough, asthma, and sore throat by regulating Qi and relieving asthma.

name: 颌厌 (Hé Yàn)
function_Chinese: 颌厌为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕、耳鸣，通调头面气血，止痛开窍。
function_English: Hé Yàn is a point on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating headaches, dizziness, and tinnitus by regulating Qi and Blood in the head and opening orifices.

name: 缺盆 (Quē Pén)
function_Chinese: 缺盆为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治咳逆气喘，胸膈满闷，肩臂痛麻，和气化痰。
function_English: Quē Pén is a point on the Stomach Meridian, treating cough, asthma, chest fullness, and shoulder-arm pain by harmonizing Qi and resolving phlegm.

name: 气会 (Qì Huì)
function_Chinese: 气会乃足少阳胆经穴，通调全身气机，主治气滞、气虚诸症，健运脾胃，理气化湿。
function_English: Qì Huì, located on the Gallbladder Meridian, regulates the body's Qi, treating Qi stagnation and deficiency, and harmonizing the Spleen and Stomach.

name: 气户 (Qì Hù)
function_Chinese: 气户为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治胸痛、咳嗽、气喘，能开胸理气，调中气滞。
function_English: Qì Hù is a point on the Stomach Meridian, treating chest pain, cough, and asthma by opening the chest and regulating Qi stagnation.

name: 库房 (Kù Fáng)
function_Chinese: 库房属足阳明胃经，主治胸胁疼痛、咳嗽气喘，调理脾胃、和中安神。
function_English: Kù Fáng, on the Stomach Meridian, treats chest and flank pain, cough, and asthma, harmonizing the Stomach and calming the spirit.

name: 屋翳 (Wū Yì)
function_Chinese: 屋翳为足阳明胃经穴，主治胸部胀痛、咳嗽气喘，和气化痰，通调气血。
function_English: Wū Yì, on the Stomach Meridian, treats chest fullness, cough, and asthma, resolving phlegm and regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 庸窗 (Yōng Chuāng)
function_Chinese: 庸窗属足阳明胃经穴，主治胸痛、咳嗽，调理脾胃，行气止痛，祛痰宁心。
function_English: Yōng Chuāng, on the Stomach Meridian, is used for chest pain and cough, regulating the Stomach and relieving pain.

name: 头锥 (Tóu Zhuī)
function_Chinese: 头锥为督脉之腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕、项背强痛，调理督脉气血，通络止痛。
function_English: Tóu Zhuī, a point on the Du Meridian, treats headache, dizziness, and neck pain by regulating Du Meridian Qi and Blood.

name: 本神 (Běn Shén)
function_Chinese: 本神为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、目眩、精神恍惚，调和肝胆，开窍安神。
function_English: Běn Shén is on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating headache, dizziness, and mental confusion by harmonizing the Liver and calming the spirit.

name: 阳白 (Yáng Bái)
function_Chinese: 阳白为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、目赤肿痛、面神经麻痹，通调头面气血。
function_English: Yáng Bái is located on the Gallbladder Meridian, used for headaches, red eyes, and facial paralysis, regulating Qi and Blood in the head.

name: 目窗 (Mù Chuāng)
function_Chinese: 目窗属足少阳胆经，主治头痛、目疾，明目止痛，通调头部气血。
function_English: Mù Chuāng, on the Gallbladder Meridian, treats headaches and eye diseases, brightening the eyes and regulating head Qi and Blood.

name: 足太阳膀胱经 (Zú Tài Yáng Páng Guāng Jīng)
function_Chinese: 足太阳膀胱经贯穿背部，主治头痛、背痛、足痛等病，调节水液代谢，利尿消肿。
function_English: The Bladder Meridian regulates water metabolism and is used to treat headaches, back pain, and leg pain, promoting urination and reducing swelling.

name: 临泣 (Lín Qì)
function_Chinese: 临泣为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、眼疾、耳鸣，通调肝胆气机，开窍醒神。
function_English: Lín Qì, on the Gallbladder Meridian, treats headaches, eye disorders, and tinnitus by regulating Liver and Gallbladder Qi.

name: 曲差 (Qū Chà)
function_Chinese: 曲差属督脉腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕、目疾，调理头面气血，止痛明目。
function_English: Qū Chà, a Du Meridian point, treats headache, dizziness, and eye issues, regulating Qi and Blood in the head and relieving pain.

name: 五处 (Wǔ Chù)
function_Chinese: 五处为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕、目疾，通调气血，舒缓头部经络。
function_English: Wǔ Chù is on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating headaches, dizziness, and eye conditions by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 眉冲 (Méi Chōng)
function_Chinese: 眉冲属足太阳膀胱经，主治头痛、目疾，清头明目，通调气血。
function_English: Méi Chōng, on the Bladder Meridian, treats headaches and eye conditions, clearing the head and brightening the eyes.

name: 攒竹 (Zǎn Zhú)
function_Chinese: 攒竹为足太阳膀胱经腧穴，主治头痛、眼疾，通调头部气血，清利头目。
function_English: Zǎn Zhú, on the Bladder Meridian, is used for headaches and eye problems, regulating head Qi and Blood.

name: 精明 (Jīng Míng)
function_Chinese: 精明为足太阳膀胱经腧穴，主治目赤肿痛、迎风流泪，清肝明目，利窍通经。
function_English: Jīng Míng, on the Bladder Meridian, treats red, painful eyes and tearing, clearing Liver heat and brightening vision.

name: 鱼腰 (Yú Yāo)
function_Chinese: 鱼腰为经外奇穴，主治目疾、头痛，通调局部经络气血，明目止痛。
function_English: Yú Yāo, an extra-meridian point, treats eye disorders and headaches, regulating local meridian Qi and Blood to relieve pain.

name: 上名 (Shàng Míng)
function_Chinese: 上名为督脉腧穴，主治目疾、头痛，清利头目，调理头部气血。
function_English: Shàng Míng, on the Du Meridian, treats eye disorders and headaches by clearing the head and regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 承泣 (Chéng Qì)
function_Chinese: 承泣属足阳明胃经，主治目赤肿痛、视力减退，清肝明目，通调气血。
function_English: Chéng Qì is on the Stomach Meridian, treating red eyes and vision problems, clearing Liver heat and regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 太阳 (Tài Yáng)
function_Chinese: 太阳为经外奇穴，主治头痛、目疾，通调局部气血，清头明目。
function_English: Tài Yáng is an extra-meridian point, treating headaches and eye conditions by regulating Qi and Blood and clearing the head.

name: 丝竹空 (Sī Zhú Kōng)
function_Chinese: 丝竹空为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、目赤肿痛、目眩，清利头目，通调气血。
function_English: Sī Zhú Kōng is on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating headaches, red eyes, and dizziness, clearing heat and regulating Qi.

name: 耳门 (Ěr Mén)
function_Chinese: 耳门属手少阳三焦经，主治耳鸣、耳聋、颞颌关节痛，通调耳部气血。
function_English: Ěr Mén is on the Sanjiao Meridian, treating tinnitus, deafness, and temporomandibular joint pain by regulating Qi and Blood in the ear.

name: 听宫 (Tīng Gōng)
function_Chinese: 听宫为手太阳小肠经腧穴，主治耳鸣、耳聋、颞颌关节痛，通调耳部气血。
function_English: Tīng Gōng is on the Small Intestine Meridian, treating tinnitus, deafness, and jaw pain by regulating Qi and Blood in the ear.

name: 听会 (Tīng Huì)
function_Chinese: 听会属足少阳胆经，主治耳鸣、耳聋、颞颌关节痛，调理气血，舒缓痛症。
function_English: Tīng Huì is on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating tinnitus, deafness, and temporomandibular pain by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 球后 (Qiú Hòu)
function_Chinese: 球后为经外奇穴，主治目疾、眼胀痛，通调局部气血，明目止痛。
function_English: Qiú Hòu, an extra-meridian point, treats eye disorders and pain by regulating Qi and Blood in the eye area.

name: 四白 (Sì Bái)
function_Chinese: 四白属足阳明胃经，主治目疾、面痛，清利头目，通调面部气血。
function_English: Sì Bái is on the Stomach Meridian, treating eye conditions and facial pain by regulating Qi and Blood in the face.

name: 巨髎 (Jù Liáo)
function_Chinese: 巨髎为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治鼻塞、口眼歪斜、面神经麻痹，通调面部气血。
function_English: Jù Liáo is on the Stomach Meridian, treating nasal congestion, facial paralysis, and trigeminal neuralgia by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 迎香 (Yíng Xiāng)
function_Chinese: 迎香属足阳明胃经，主治鼻塞、鼻炎、面神经麻痹，通调鼻窍，行气化滞。
function_English: Yíng Xiāng is on the Stomach Meridian, treating nasal congestion, rhinitis, and facial paralysis by regulating Qi and clearing the nasal passages.

name: 地仓 (Dì Cāng)
function_Chinese: 地仓为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治口歪眼斜、面神经麻痹，调理气血，止痛宁神。
function_English: Dì Cāng is on the Stomach Meridian, treating facial paralysis and trigeminal neuralgia by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 颊车 (Jiá Chē)
function_Chinese: 颊车为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治牙痛、面神经麻痹、口眼歪斜，通调局部气血，止痛止痉。
function_English: Jiá Chē is on the Stomach Meridian, treating toothache, facial paralysis, and lockjaw by regulating Qi and Blood and relieving pain.

name: 手太阳小肠经 (Shǒu Tài Yáng Xiǎo Cháng Jīng)
function_Chinese: 手太阳小肠经贯穿手臂，主治肩痛、颈痛、上肢痛，通调经络，舒缓痛症。
function_English: The Small Intestine Meridian runs through the arm, treating shoulder, neck, and upper limb pain by regulating the meridian and relieving pain.

name: 卤会 (Lǔ Huì)
function_Chinese: 卤会为督脉腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕，调理头部气血，止痛安神。
function_English: Lǔ Huì, on the Du Meridian, treats headaches and dizziness by regulating Qi and Blood in the head.

name: 神庭 (Shén Tíng)
function_Chinese: 神庭属督脉腧穴，主治头痛、失眠、眩晕，调理督脉气血，宁心安神。
function_English: Shén Tíng, on the Du Meridian, treats headache, insomnia, and dizziness by regulating Du Meridian Qi and calming the mind.

name: 印堂 (Yìn Táng)
function_Chinese: 印堂为经外奇穴，主治头痛、失眠、鼻塞，通调头部气血，宁心安神。
function_English: Yìn Táng, an extra-meridian point, treats headache, insomnia, and nasal congestion by regulating head Qi and Blood and calming the mind.

name: 素髎 (Sù Liáo)
function_Chinese: 素髎为督脉腧穴，主治鼻塞、鼻衄、头痛，通调鼻窍，行气止痛。
function_English: Sù Liáo, on the Du Meridian, treats nasal congestion, epistaxis, and headache by clearing the nasal passages and relieving pain.

name: 人中 (Rén Zhōng)
function_Chinese: 人中属督脉腧穴，主治昏厥、中风、面瘫，醒脑开窍，通调气血。
function_English: Rén Zhōng, on the Du Meridian, is used for fainting, stroke, and facial paralysis, awakening the brain and regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 兑端 (Duì Duān)
function_Chinese: 兑端为督脉腧穴，主治口眼歪斜、舌强语塞，通调局部气血，舒缓筋络。
function_English: Duì Duān, on the Du Meridian, treats facial paralysis and speech problems by regulating Qi and Blood in the area.

name: 承浆 (Chéng Jiāng)
function_Chinese: 承浆属任脉腧穴，主治面瘫、口眼歪斜、齿痛，通调气血，止痛止痉。
function_English: Chéng Jiāng, on the Ren Meridian, treats facial paralysis, toothache, and jaw spasms by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 廉泉 (Lián Quán)
function_Chinese: 廉泉为任脉腧穴，主治舌强语塞、吞咽困难，通调气血，清利咽喉。
function_English: Lián Quán, on the Ren Meridian, treats speech disorders and swallowing difficulties by regulating Qi and Blood and clearing the throat.

name: 气舍 (Qì Shè)
function_Chinese: 气舍为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治咳嗽、气喘、咽喉肿痛，通调气机，利咽平喘。
function_English: Qì Shè is a point on the Gallbladder Meridian, used to treat cough, asthma, and sore throat by regulating Qi and relieving asthma.

name: 颌厌 (Hé Yàn)
function_Chinese: 颌厌为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕、耳鸣，通调头面气血，止痛开窍。
function_English: Hé Yàn is a point on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating headaches, dizziness, and tinnitus by regulating Qi and Blood in the head and opening orifices.

name: 缺盆 (Quē Pén)
function_Chinese: 缺盆为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治咳逆气喘，胸膈满闷，肩臂痛麻，和气化痰。
function_English: Quē Pén is a point on the Stomach Meridian, treating cough, asthma, chest fullness, and shoulder-arm pain by harmonizing Qi and resolving phlegm.

name: 气会 (Qì Huì)
function_Chinese: 气会乃足少阳胆经穴，通调全身气机，主治气滞、气虚诸症，健运脾胃，理气化湿。
function_English: Qì Huì, located on the Gallbladder Meridian, regulates the body's Qi, treating Qi stagnation and deficiency, and harmonizing the Spleen and Stomach.

name: 气户 (Qì Hù)
function_Chinese: 气户为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治胸痛、咳嗽、气喘，能开胸理气，调中气滞。
function_English: Qì Hù is a point on the Stomach Meridian, treating chest pain, cough, and asthma by opening the chest and regulating Qi stagnation.

name: 库房 (Kù Fáng)
function_Chinese: 库房属足阳明胃经，主治胸胁疼痛、咳嗽气喘，调理脾胃、和中安神。
function_English: Kù Fáng, on the Stomach Meridian, treats chest and flank pain, cough, and asthma, harmonizing the Stomach and calming the spirit.

name: 屋翳 (Wū Yì)
function_Chinese: 屋翳为足阳明胃经穴，主治胸部胀痛、咳嗽气喘，和气化痰，通调气血。
function_English: Wū Yì, on the Stomach Meridian, treats chest fullness, cough, and asthma, resolving phlegm and regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 庸窗 (Yōng Chuāng)
function_Chinese: 庸窗属足阳明胃经穴，主治胸痛、咳嗽，调理脾胃，行气止痛，祛痰宁心。
function_English: Yōng Chuāng, on the Stomach Meridian, is used for chest pain and cough, regulating the Stomach and relieving pain.

name: 头锥 (Tóu Zhuī)
function_Chinese: 头锥为督脉之腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕、项背强痛，调理督脉气血，通络止痛。
function_English: Tóu Zhuī, a point on the Du Meridian, treats headache, dizziness, and neck pain by regulating Du Meridian Qi and Blood.

name: 本神 (Běn Shén)
function_Chinese: 本神为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、目眩、精神恍惚，调和肝胆，开窍安神。
function_English: Běn Shén is on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating headache, dizziness, and mental confusion by harmonizing the Liver and calming the spirit.

name: 阳白 (Yáng Bái)
function_Chinese: 阳白为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、目赤肿痛、面神经麻痹，通调头面气血。
function_English: Yáng Bái is located on the Gallbladder Meridian, used for headaches, red eyes, and facial paralysis, regulating Qi and Blood in the head.

name: 目窗 (Mù Chuāng)
function_Chinese: 目窗属足少阳胆经，主治头痛、目疾，明目止痛，通调头部气血。
function_English: Mù Chuāng, on the Gallbladder Meridian, treats headaches and eye diseases, brightening the eyes and regulating head Qi and Blood.

name: 足太阳膀胱经 (Zú Tài Yáng Páng Guāng Jīng)
function_Chinese: 足太阳膀胱经贯穿背部，主治头痛、背痛、足痛等病，调节水液代谢，利尿消肿。
function_English: The Bladder Meridian regulates water metabolism and is used to treat headaches, back pain, and leg pain, promoting urination and reducing swelling.

function_Chinese: 临泣为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、眼疾、耳鸣，通调肝胆气机，开窍醒神。
function_English: Lín Qì, on the Gallbladder Meridian, treats headaches, eye disorders, and tinnitus by regulating Liver and Gallbladder Qi.

name: 曲差 (Qū Chà)
function_Chinese: 曲差属督脉腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕、目疾，调理头面气血，止痛明目。
function_English: Qū Chà, a Du Meridian point, treats headache, dizziness, and eye issues, regulating Qi and Blood in the head and relieving pain.

name: 上星 (Shàng Xīng)
function_Chinese: 上星为督脉腧穴，主治头痛、鼻塞、失眠，通调督脉气血，宁神开窍。
function_English: Shàng Xīng, on the Du Meridian, treats headache, nasal congestion, and insomnia by regulating Qi and calming the mind.

name: 五处 (Wǔ Chù)
function_Chinese: 五处为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、眩晕、目疾，通调气血，舒缓头部经络。
function_English: Wǔ Chù is on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating headaches, dizziness, and eye conditions by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 眉冲 (Méi Chōng)
function_Chinese: 眉冲属足太阳膀胱经，主治头痛、目疾，清头明目，通调气血。
function_English: Méi Chōng, on the Bladder Meridian, treats headaches and eye conditions, clearing the head and brightening the eyes.

name: 攒竹 (Zǎn Zhú)
function_Chinese: 攒竹为足太阳膀胱经腧穴，主治头痛、眼疾，通调头部气血，清利头目。
function_English: Zǎn Zhú, on the Bladder Meridian, is used for headaches and eye problems, regulating head Qi and Blood.

name: 精明 (Jīng Míng)
function_Chinese: 精明为足太阳膀胱经腧穴，主治目赤肿痛、迎风流泪，清肝明目，利窍通经。
function_English: Jīng Míng, on the Bladder Meridian, treats red, painful eyes and tearing, clearing Liver heat and brightening vision.

name: 鱼腰 (Yú Yāo)
function_Chinese: 鱼腰为经外奇穴，主治目疾、头痛，通调局部经络气血，明目止痛。
function_English: Yú Yāo, an extra-meridian point, treats eye disorders and headaches, regulating local meridian Qi and Blood to relieve pain.

name: 上名 (Shàng Míng)
function_Chinese: 上名为督脉腧穴，主治目疾、头痛，清利头目，调理头部气血。
function_English: Shàng Míng, on the Du Meridian, treats eye disorders and headaches by clearing the head and regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 承泣 (Chéng Qì)
function_Chinese: 承泣属足阳明胃经，主治目赤肿痛、视力减退，清肝明目，通调气血。
function_English: Chéng Qì is on the Stomach Meridian, treating red eyes and vision problems, clearing Liver heat and regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 太阳 (Tài Yáng)
function_Chinese: 太阳为经外奇穴，主治头痛、目疾，通调局部气血，清头明目。
function_English: Tài Yáng is an extra-meridian point, treating headaches and eye conditions by regulating Qi and Blood and clearing the head.

name: 丝竹空 (Sī Zhú Kōng)
function_Chinese: 丝竹空为足少阳胆经腧穴，主治头痛、目赤肿痛、目眩，清利头目，通调气血。
function_English: Sī Zhú Kōng is on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating headaches, red eyes, and dizziness, clearing heat and regulating Qi.

name: 耳门 (Ěr Mén)
function_Chinese: 耳门属手少阳三焦经，主治耳鸣、耳聋、颞颌关节痛，通调耳部气血。
function_English: Ěr Mén is on the Sanjiao Meridian, treating tinnitus, deafness, and temporomandibular joint pain by regulating Qi and Blood in the ear.

function_Chinese: 听宫为手太阳小肠经腧穴，主治耳鸣、耳聋、颞颌关节痛，通调耳部气血。
function_English: Tīng Gōng is on the Small Intestine Meridian, treating tinnitus, deafness, and jaw pain by regulating Qi and Blood in the ear.

function_Chinese: 听会属足少阳胆经，主治耳鸣、耳聋、颞颌关节痛，调理气血，舒缓痛症。
function_English: Tīng Huì is on the Gallbladder Meridian, treating tinnitus, deafness, and temporomandibular pain by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 球后 (Qiú Hòu)
function_Chinese: 球后为经外奇穴，主治目疾、眼胀痛，通调局部气血，明目止痛。
function_English: Qiú Hòu, an extra-meridian point, treats eye disorders and pain by regulating Qi and Blood in the eye area.

name: 四白 (Sì Bái)
function_Chinese: 四白属足阳明胃经，主治目疾、面痛，清利头目，通调面部气血。
function_English: Sì Bái is on the Stomach Meridian, treating eye conditions and facial pain by regulating Qi and Blood in the face.

name: 巨髎 (Jù Liáo)
function_Chinese: 巨髎为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治鼻塞、口眼歪斜、面神经麻痹，通调面部气血。
function_English: Jù Liáo is on the Stomach Meridian, treating nasal congestion, facial paralysis, and trigeminal neuralgia by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 迎香 (Yíng Xiāng)
function_Chinese: 迎香属足阳明胃经，主治鼻塞、鼻炎、面神经麻痹，通调鼻窍，行气化滞。
function_English: Yíng Xiāng is on the Stomach Meridian, treating nasal congestion, rhinitis, and facial paralysis by regulating Qi and clearing the nasal passages.

name: 地仓 (Dì Cāng)
function_Chinese: 地仓为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治口歪眼斜、面神经麻痹，调理气血，止痛宁神。
function_English: Dì Cāng is on the Stomach Meridian, treating facial paralysis and trigeminal neuralgia by regulating Qi and Blood.

name: 颊车 (Jiá Chē)
function_Chinese: 颊车为足阳明胃经腧穴，主治牙痛、面神经麻痹、口眼歪斜，通调局部气血，止痛止痉。
function_English: Jiá Chē is on the Stomach Meridian, treating toothache, facial paralysis, and lockjaw by regulating Qi and Blood and relieving pain.

name: 手太阳小肠经 (Shǒu Tài Yáng Xiǎo Cháng Jīng)
function_Chinese: 手太阳小肠经贯穿手臂，主治肩痛、颈痛、上肢痛，通调经络，舒缓痛症。
function_English: The Small Intestine Meridian runs through the arm, treating shoulder, neck, and upper limb pain by regulating the meridian and relieving pain.
